thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au | 2 of 37
thread.title: Gina

author: Gina
title: Gina
text:
I recently purchased a Kia Sportage from the Browns Plains Motorama. I received excellent service from everyone at Kia.
Sales person Leo was extremely knowledgeable and helpful and exceptionally patient.
I also arranged my finance through Nick who was excellent, very helpful and made sure he went the extra mile to ensure I got the best deal possible.
The whole team where helpful and friendly every time I went in and where always willing to answer my questions.
Thank you for making the daunting process of buying a car relaxing and fun!
